comments:
System config:

OS: Linux RH 9
JDK: 1.4.2
Eclipse: Linux-GTK 3.0 N20030908
Locale: zh_CN.GB18030 or C

CVS server config:

OS: Linux RH 8
CVS: 1.11.5

This problem shows up after 3.0M3.

1- Open CVS Repo perspective, and go to the CVS Repositories
navigator
2- Open a repository
3- Open any module, and try to list the files

Expected results:
  Files in the repo should be listed.

Currently:
  A small dialog pops up showing the error message:
    Unresolved compilation error: unreachable code
  Try to check out the module, and you also get this error.

Here is the exception:

--------------------

java.lang.Error: Unresolved compilation problem:
        Unreachable code
 
        at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.RemoteFolderMemberFetch
er.getFiles(RemoteFolderMemberFetcher.java:306)
        at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.RemoteFolderMemberFetch
er.fetchMembers(RemoteFolderMemberFetcher.java:88)
        at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.operations.FetchMembersOperation.ex
ecute(FetchMembersOperation.java:105)
        at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.operations.CVSOperation.run(CVSOper
ation.java:126)
        at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.model.RemoteFolderElement.fetchDefe
rredChildren(RemoteFolderElement.java:76)
        at org.eclipse.ui.progress.DeferredTreeContentManager$2.run(DeferredTree
ContentManager.java:138)
        at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:61)

---------------------

Extra info:

Test result on Windows:

OS: Windows XP (english version)
JDK: 1.4.2
Eclipse: 3.0M3
Locale: en_US

It's kind of works, but not all the modules. I can list files in most modules,
but Eclipse will get the "unreachable code" error on some modules.

The modules that can't be listed/checked out have nothing special. Actually, I
have gone back to 3.0M2 and it's working fine, both on Linux and Windows (XP &
2000).
Just downloaded 3.0 N20030913, and it seems to fix the CVS file listing problem.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 42813 ***
